tool.name: gbToFasta
tool.description: Convert GenBank records to fasta and Create table with coding regions information for each mRNA record
tool.command: gbToFaRa /dev/null '${outputfa}' outputra outputta '${gbfile}' #if $cds == "yes" && raToTab -cols=acc,cds outputra '${outputcds}' #end if

param.name: cds
param.label: Create table with coding regions information for each mRNA record

tool.help:
gbToFasta =========
Convert GenBank records to fasta ---------------------------------
gbToFaRa - Convert GenBank flat format file to an fa file containing the sequence data, an ra file containing other relevant info and a ta file containing summary statistics. usage: gbToFaRa filterFile faFile raFile taFile genBankFile(s) where filterFile is definition of which records and fields use /dev/null if you want no filtering.
gbToFaRa /dev/null gbfile.fa \ gbfile.ra gbfile.ta gbfile
Create table with coding regions information for each mRNA record ----------------------------------------------------------------- raToTab - Convert ra file to table. raToTab -cols=acc,cds gbfile.ra gbfile.cds
Source code: ============
http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/admin/exe/
